name: scratch-blocks-generator
description: This repo ports the [Scratch Blocks Generator](https://github.com/scratchblocks/scratchblocks) by [tjvr](https://github.com/tjvr) into Google Docs and Google Slides for educators to quickly and easily create materials related to Scratch.

scripts.copy:global: cp -r src/global/* dist/scratch-blocks-docs && cp -r src/global/* dist/scratch-blocks-slides
scripts.copy: npm run copy:global && npm run copy:docs && npm run copy:slides
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:docs && npm run deploy:slides
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run deploy
